glsa.title: OpenSSL: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: An error in OpenSSL might allow for a Denial of Service when printing certificate details.

background.p: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.

description.p: The ASN1_STRING_print_ex() function does not properly check the provided length of a BMPString or UniversalString, leading to an invalid memory access.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to print a specially crafted certificate, possibly leading to a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
